Title: Pictorial explanation of the First Five Year Plan (1953-1957) for the development of the national economy of our nation
Designer: General Political Department of the Chinese People's Liberation Army (中国人民解放军总政治部)
Notes: "Pictorial explanation of the First Five Year Plan (1953-1957) for the development of the national economy of our nation" (我国发展国民经济的第一个五年(1953-1957)计划图解) is a series of 12 posters, ca. 1955, possibly incomplete.The fifth sheet, "Development of agricultural production in five years" (五年内农业生产的发展), subtitled "The socialist transformation of agriculture" (对农业的社会主义改造), shows mechanized agriculture and estimated increases in crop yields.
